structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.text: Any estate may be made to commence in the future by deed, in like manner as by will, and any estate which would be good as an executory devise or bequest shall be good if created by deed.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2341.
